title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, generate with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk to a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for local LLM chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat-style interface) for any Ollama model; runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama in Kubernetes with GPU support and model pre-load.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama inside Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cpp
summary: Discussion board where llama.cpp and Ollama developers coordinate GGUF format changes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Terminal UI inspired by OpenAI Codex but powered by local Ollama code models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop app that wraps Ollama with a native chat window.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for integrating Python apps with a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM power to any server via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models directly in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Subreddit dedicated to sharing models, tips, and projects around the Ollama ecosystem.
